meanings.sent2: The menstruating woman needed to rest.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at the menstruating woman curiously.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned a deep red, like a menstruating sunset.
meanings.sent5: The image of the menstruating woman stayed in his mind.

meanings.sent1: She was menstruating heavily this month.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised her to rest while menstruating.
meanings.sent3: The car seemed to be menstruating oil all over the driveway.
meanings.sent4: His heart was menstruating sorrow after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The river was menstruating water downstream.
